p.s: The article Is the usefulness of unions in the protection of workers rights coming to an end? The answer is yes is written by Brian Pollard.
The article was published in The Gulf News on 24 November 2011 and presents BriansBrian's opinion on the question if unions are still necessary or if they are even harmful.
Brian begins the article with explaining why unions hashave been a good thing.
So he says that they had improved workind conditions of employees.
But now daysnowadays things like working conditions, work time and good wages are already regulated by laws.
He even says that products by union workers got so expensive that they cannot compete against cheaper products.
His last argument why unions are harmful, is that through the unions employees got more powerful than employers.
In his opinion is this bad for a working environment.
All in all it seems like Brian is against unions because of the development in the past.
